name: Help Penguin
description:
Adventure games is probably the most common theme when it comes to make adventure flying games. Itch.io App Store is full of arcade jumping games but it's still hard to find a good free flappy game for Android to live the real adventure with it, Isn't it string!

But it's not the case for you today, Welcome to "Help Penguin", so be ready for a flappy game experience. Fly games has a classic in adventure flying game-play, with stunning and clean graphics and sounds.

Why are you still reading this and wasting your time. It's time to stop reading and start downloading this free flying adventure game. Oh you want some more details about it? Here you go then!

How to Play Help Penguin:

It's simple to play but hard to master, you have to be a good player to master it. Touch the screen to jump, and try to avoid anything danger, and help penguins. That's all.

Feature of Help Penguin:

  • Amazing and clean graphics
  • Simple and user friendly controls
  • Clean and hight quality sounds
  • Optimized for all Android devices including tabs
  • Google Plus sign in and leaderboard available

    • So are you ready to hit the game and live the adventure?

    It's a perfect and a must have this adventure game if you are bored with playing regular flying games. Just download Help Penguin and start your own adventure. Have fun !

    Don't forget to leave us rating and review to let us know what you think about Help Penguin. We always want to continue to deliver some of the best and most fun flying games for your Android. Your feedback plays an important role to be able to achieve this goal.
